quotes.quote: Any man may be in good spirits and good temper when he's well dressed.
We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
It is good to love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is well done.
Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
The evil that men do lives after them;The good is oft interred with their bones.
This time, like all times, is a very good time - if we but know what to do with it.
Good words are worth much, and cost little.
When a good man is hurt, all who would be called good must suffer with him.
A good horse makes short miles.
The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
A good king knows when to save his strength and when to destroy his enemies.

The good of man is the active exercise of his souls faculties in conformity with excellence or virtue, or if there be several human excellences or virtues, in conformity with the best and most perfect among them.
Life comes from physical survival; but the good life comes from what we care about.
It's good to have money and the things that money will buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money won't buy.
Making good judgments when one has complete data, facts, and knowledge is not leadership - it's bookkeeping.
Law is order, and good law is good order.
A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.
A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.
Good ideas often take wings and fly beyond our reach, while bad ones will cling to us like barnacles to a vessel.
A good compromise, a good piece of legislation, is like a good sentence; or a good piece of music. Everybody can recognize it. They say, "Huh. It works. It makes sense.
The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction not a destination.
A good many things go around in the dark besides Santa Claus.
No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
Wishing good, merely, is a lukewarm charity; but doing good is divine.
Good judgment comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
The work an unknown good man has done is like a vein of water flowing hidden underground, secretly making the ground green.
If you can't make it good, at least make it look good.
The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
At the end of the day it's not â€˜what looks good' that matters, it's â€˜what feels' good.
It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
No beauty shines brighter than that of a good heart.

That man is good who does good to others; if he suffers on account of the good he does, he is very good; if he suffers at the hands of those to whom he has done good, then his goodness is so great that it could be enhanced only by greater sufferings; and if he should die at their hands, his virtue can go no further: it is heroic, it is perfect.
If you would not cease to love mankind you must not cease to do them good.
